Megatron Revived:
 
Megatron watched as the femme passed.  Something about her did not sit well, and he then secretly resolved to watch her every move for a while, to see if she possessed any ulterior motives.  He started to follow, but then cast a look to the sky.
"See you soon..."
He followed the others back to the base.

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
"Well come on," said Fortuneteller, walking past him.
